medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric abdominal pain progressing to the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started at 11 PM the previous night, progressed to the RLQ, and was associated with one episode of non-bloody emesis overnight. The patient has since denied fevers, chills, and is no longer nauseous.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past Medical History: none; Past Surgical History: Left elbow surgery.
medical_history.family_history: Colon cancer. No inflammatory bowel disease (IBD).
